Header: Rain to continue today as well
Content: Meteorological Department states that due to the change in the atmosphere several areas of the Island will receive rains exceeding100 milliliters in the evening. Meanwhile due to the prevailing rainy weather the sluice gates of the following water reserves have been still left open.:-Senanayak Samudraya, Parakrama Samudraya, Udawalawa, Veheragala, Lunugamvehera, Victoria, Rajangana and Deduru Oya. Disaster management center request the resident s of low laying areas around the above water reserves to be cautious.
